name: Blitzkrieg 3
description: Blitzkrieg 3 is an online WW2 RTS made for true admirers of strategic mastery! Challenge your tactical skills in historical campaigns and defeat other players or powerful Neural Network AI in competitive matches.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsXP (Service Pack 3) 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo 2,66 Ghz or AMD Phenom™ X3 2,4 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 240 / Radeon HD 6570 DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space Additional Notes: INTERNET CONNECTION IS REQUIRED TO PLAY
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space Additional Notes: INTERNET CONNECTION IS REQUIRED TO PLAY
